title: IndiGo Staff Slammed For Stopping Child With Disability From Boarding - NDTV
content: IndiGo Staff Slammed For Stopping Child With Disability From Boarding  NDTVView Full coverage on Google News
description: IndiGo airlines faced the heat from passengers for not allowing a child with disability to board a flight with his family at the Ranchi airport on Saturday. The airlines said the child posed a threat to other passengers' safety.
